Reviews.Title: not a unlocked phone and the battery is rubbish
Reviews.Author: anglyalex
Reviews.Content: the cellphone does not match what they advertised.when i got the package, it is not a unlocked phone. and the battery is rubbish, only 3 days and battery will never start the phone and i have to buy a new one.do not buy anything from this seller, or you will regret.

Reviews.Title: not unlocked
Reviews.Author: Shane
Reviews.Content: I purchased 2 of the blackberry 9630 and they supposed to be unlocked, however when I put in my sim card, the phone is saying that "activation required", which means I now have 2 seek out a way to unlock these phones. I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: este producto es un desastre
Reviews.Author: luima lembert
Reviews.Content: Este producto no sirve, es de lo peor, el sistema operativo no sirve, lo que hace el teléfono infuncional, se descarga inmediatamente, aunque les cambiamos la pila, es un gran problema cargarlo.

Reviews.Title: Just not it
Reviews.Author: EMMANUEL GUIDDEL SOBGA
Reviews.Content: They did not explain that you will have a lot of trouble trying to activate and get ride of the"activation required".It is just not simple for those who just want to plug their sim card and start their phone.I have just learnt a lesson which is to pay the most to get the best,never again.I will buy me an Iphone 5 and get peace of mind.There is no wonder Blackberry is dying because of those many little complication to use their phones.It sucks.I will donate this one to charity but you have to tell your customer that your phones are not that unlocked and they need to go through a long process that can lead them to spend another sum of money.

Reviews.Title: I had no problems but one
Reviews.Author: Brittany-Marie Aarons
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone for international purposes (that is, if you plan on using it in countries where blackberries still prevail), however because the Tour is not a popular as other models, it does not always work. Sometimes the "EDGE" (proof that internet is flowing) will shut down, not because of your network service provider, but because of the phone itself.The phone wasn't really meant to work outside of the country it was made, so you'll find it sometimes becomes incompatible with the service. If this doesn't matter, then it's a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Good phone but some challenges
Reviews.Author: Ssekitoleko Richard
Reviews.Content: The phones are great. But the battery life is poor whether in use or not in use(less than 60 hours to be precise).In addition the phones were locked and had to get activated before they could start working.

Reviews.Title: very good phone
Reviews.Author: alpha
Reviews.Content: i like it! it is a nice phone in a good condition of services. i will recommend this to any customers.

Reviews.Title: Served its purpose
Reviews.Author: Jarwrat "Jamdowner"
Reviews.Content: Item was received and in better condition than thought it would be.  outdated but served its purpose for the duration I had it.

Reviews.Title: Good buy for the price!
Reviews.Author: Melanie Anderson
Reviews.Content: Works great and I had no issues programing it for AT&T.; The only problem is that i can not use the internet without going to AT&T; and asking them to instal all the books for web use.

Reviews.Title: TRASH
Reviews.Author: UPSET
Reviews.Content: i bought this phone a month ago it said unlocked however it is NOT i have to handle it like i am handling a baby it keep blanking out i'm totally upset.....the phone is a PIECE OF CRAP.

Reviews.Title: I got another item!!
Reviews.Author: jhonny
Reviews.Content: I'm surprised!! ... when I opened the box... got a purse!! ... I'm disappointed! I hope that now send my phone... I need it!

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: Kim Ross
Reviews.Content: this product gets  three stars because it said factory unlocked but it is not.  outside of that  I had no other  problems.

Reviews.Title: They lied to me
Reviews.Author: J. M. NAVA "Blue Star"
Reviews.Content: The cell pone it's not unlocked: Now what do I do with it? It's not fare. They shouldn't lie to custumers.

Reviews.Title: bb phone
Reviews.Author: irene gold
Reviews.Content: I have never see a new phone with the SIM inside the phone beside that the back cover is crack. Am really disappointed and I will never purchase a phone from the retailer.

Reviews.Title: worst
Reviews.Author: Barbara Myles "bm"
Reviews.Content: it was an old used phone i gave it to my daughter in law a a christmas gift was very disapointed

Reviews.Title: its cool
Reviews.Author: apple
Reviews.Content: its good, i like it its not bad, i encourage you to check it out. I'm sure you will like it

Reviews.Title: BB Tour 9630 GSM unlocked cell phone with 3.2 Camera and GPS with fast processing from supplier
Reviews.Author: Visa
Reviews.Content: This cell phone is really good, I even ordered one for my wife who was using my cell phone and was pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Just Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: stephen boyce
Reviews.Content: I give it to a family member in another country and it is great no problems; I will be looking for more great deals on them.

Reviews.Title: niceeeee
Reviews.Author: afolorunso mayowa
Reviews.Content: itz nice n upto expectation. i really love it. try check it out. so so gallant. nice one there dudes

Reviews.Title: g
Reviews.Author: fernando menco
Reviews.Content: excellent product as it would cimplio with my expectations as I buy another thanks for buying other s 1 c

Reviews.Title: No Internet access
Reviews.Author: lozindaba
Reviews.Content: Despite being refered to as unblocked, my network provider cant access internet on this verizon phone.Kindly find a way to work around that cos many people assume an unblocked phone can be used without limitations in accesibility.

ProductInfo.Features:
BlackBerry smartphone with QWERTY keyboard; dual-network capable for 3G-enabled GSM access when traveling abroad
Sprint Mobile Broadband Network via EV-DO connectivity; GPS turn-by-turn directions via Sprint Navigation; Sprint TV and Sprint Music Store enabled
3.2-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; MicroSD memory expansion to 16 GB; access to personal and corporate email
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 336 hours (14 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Tour 9630 GSM Unlocked Cell Phone with 3.2 MP Camera and GPS - Unlocked Phone - No Warranty - Black
